# `create_giotto_polygon_object`

Create a giotto polygon object


## Description

Create a giotto polygon object


## Usage

```r
create_giotto_polygon_object(
  name = "cell",
  spatVector = NULL,
  spatVectorCentroids = NULL,
  overlaps = NULL
)
```
